question: am i doing this right cuz i dunt want any haram or anything.Can u advice me
answer:
QUESTION

My father income is haram and i told him about it and everyhting and he told me that h'll try to get rid of this inshALlah.SO basically i m trying to help my father by giving him 400 $ per month (which i get cuz myself i work for halal buisnessas a part time employee).I am giving him 400$ for my expenses like (for my rent ,food).so am i doing this right cuz i dunt want any haram or anything.Can u advice me ,what should i do?May ALlah grant you for your great work .

ANSWER


Share:

Yes, you are doing the right thing by assisting your father with Halaal wealth. Also, you should continue advising him politely about the nature of his income.

If he persists, you should try to avoid consuming his food.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
